empty_message: PLS, send me a text message with the name of the place bro..
start_message:
This is simple weather bot!
You can rapidly get information about weather all around the world!
Simply enter the name of the place where you want to know the weather.
For example, New York
help_message:
Available commands:
/start - start the bot
/help - show available commands
/language - choose your language
error_message: Error occurred during request. Be sure you passed correct city name.
